item.description: The United States was India's top export destination in 2024, with shipments worth $87.3 billion.

item.title: For Q2, the size of the VC secondary market reached $61.1 billion, according to PitchBook
item.description: In Q2 2025, the VC direct secondary market in the U.S. was $61.1 billion, according to new data from PitchBook.
